item.description:
On February 3rd, 2010 join the NEREIA group and welcome Matt Desrochers...

NEREIA is incredibly excited and eager to welcome Matt Desrochers this coming meeting. Matt is going to speak to us all about how to keep your deals on track by avoiding legal issues. Matthew T. Desrochers is a real estate and bankruptcy attorney with offices is Stoneham and Reading, MA. He holds a mortgage broker license and real estate broker’s license. Practicing law for ten years Matthew has conducted over 10000 closing representing buyers, sellers, banks, developers and investor just like you. Matthew has seen it all as an attorney related to issues that you face every day. Personally as an investor Matthew also owns property in Peabody, Worcester and Charlestown, MA. He wants to share his knowledge with you! You don't want to miss this event....we hope to see you there!


YOU WILL LEARN:

* US Bank v. Ibanez the Seminole foreclosure case in Massachusetts
is analyzed. This will save you time, and time is money
*Current bankruptcy law and how it affects your real estate
investing
*Legal issues with Short Sales and Short Sale Flips
*How to avoid litigation; go from getting sued to be suing; CYA…
*LLC’s how to set them up in Massachusetts - advantages -
disadvantages etc.
*Loan modification, how to modify an existing mortgage
*Short Refinances, how they work and how to get one for you or a
client.


The Best Western Hotel
187 Chelsmford St.
Cheslmford, MA 01824

When: Wednesday, February 3rd, 2010, 6:30-10:00 PM

Admission Fees

Guests: $20.00 at the Door
NEREIA and Associated REIA Members: FREE

Ask about getting YOUR membership today!
